text: The COVID-19 pandemic in Guyana is part of the worldwide pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 () caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (). The virus was confirmed to have reached Guyana on 11 March 2020. The first case was a woman who travelled from New York, a 52-year-old woman suffering from other health conditions, including diabetes and hypertension. The woman died at the Georgetown Public Hospital. ==Measures taken== * All borders, airports, and ports are closed for passengers. * All schools are closed. * A curfew has been instituted between 18:00 and 06:00. * All non-essential businesses must close. * All post offices are closed. * Everybody should stay at home except for essential journeys. * Public transport may only carry half the number of passengers they are licensed to carry. ==References== Category:Guyana Guyana
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Guyana
